text: Radhakrishn is Indian mythological television series. It is produced by Siddharth Kumar Tiwari, Rahul Kumar Tiwari and Gayatri Gill Tiwari. Which is produced by under his own production banner Swastik Productions and is directed by Rahul Tiwari. It is broadcast on Star Bharat from 1 October 2018. ==Cast== * Sumedh Mudgalkar/ Himanshu Soni as Krishna * Mallika Singh/ Shivya Pathania as Radha *Arpan Das as Child Sambh and Kartikey Malviya as the elder * Harsh Vashisht as sridama (radha's brother) * Akangsha Rawat as kirtida (radha's mummy) * Basant bhatt as balram * Divya gupta/Saurabh raj jain as narrators of story * Gavie Chahal as nand (as krishna's foster father) * Reena Kapoor as yashoda (as krishna's foster mother) * Naveen Jingar as vasudev (krishna's biological father) * Falaq Naaz as devaki (as krishna's biological mother) * Arpit Ranka as king kansa * Rushiraj Pawar as ayan ghosh (Abhimanyu) the so called husband of radha * Malini sengupta as jatila devi (mother-in law of radha) * Rakesh kukreti as vrishbanu (father of radha) * Nimai bali as ayans father * Kumar hegde as narad * Pooja sharma as adi shakti * Ashwin patil as dhama ==References== Category:2018 Indian television series debuts
title: RadhaKrishn
